Made with React JS. 

## üöÄ Quick start

1.  **Clone this site.**

    Use git bash to clone this project.

    ```shell
    # Git bash here
    git clone https://github.com/mcmdothub/mcmdothub-homepage-react.git
    ```

1.  **Start developing.**

    Navigate into your new site‚Äôs directory and start it up.

    ```shell
    cd mcmdothub-homepage-react/
    npm-install
	npm-start
    ```
